nodes.text: Star Wars: I Want to Be a Jedi (2017)

Star Wars: I Want to Be a Jedi is a canon hardcover reference title that collects and reprints material originally published in Star Wars: I Want to Be a Jedi (2016 edition, written by Simon Beecroft) and Star Wars Character Encyclopedia: Updated and Expanded (2016, written by Beecroft and Pablo Hidalgo). It was published by DK Publishing in 2017.
